posts.post_content:
Probably be sweet with reanimation.   
Turn 2: Reanimate this guy  
Turn 3: "Sorry my friend, you can no longer play the game. feel free to keep putting that land down each turn though"  
  
Mix with some dark ritual (as per the usual) and some discard and they'll not only be stuck without permanents early but without cards soon after!

posts.post_content: If you cast [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter) then his ability will trigger and be placed on the stack before Orni resolves. You will need to return a permanent before Orni hits the board and so will not be able to target it. No infinite Storm unless you have two Ornis.
posts.html:
If you cast Ornithopter then his ability will trigger and be placed on the stack before Orni resolves. You will need to return a permanent before Orni hits the board and so will not be able to target it. No infinite Storm unless you have two Ornis.

posts.post_content: I like this guy with [Forced Fruition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forced Fruition). Pick off the threats on their field when you cast a spell and their hand fills up. If they cast a kill spell, fine, they overfill fill their hand and are close to mill at this point.
